scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:todos" "npm run dev:users"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd host && npm install && cd ../todos-mfe && npm install && cd ../users-mfe && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd host && npm run build && cd ../todos-mfe && npm run build && cd ../users-mfe && npm run build
scripts.preview: npm run build:all && concurrently "cd host && npm run preview" "cd todos-mfe && npm run preview" "cd users-mfe && npm run preview" && sleep 2 && open http://localhost:3000
